```py
name: OpenCV-ML
channels:
  - conda-forge
dependencies:
  - python==3.6
  - numpy==1.15.4
  - scipy==1.1.0
  - scikit-learn==0.20.1
  - matplotlib
  - jupyter==1.0
  - notebook==5.7.4
  - pandas==0.23.4
  - theano
  - keras==2.2.4
  - mkl-service==1.1.2
  - pip
  - pip:
    - opencv-contrib-python==4.1.0.25
```

```py
$ source activate OpenCV-ML  # on Linux / Mac OS X
$ activate OpenCV-ML         # on Windows
```

```py
$ source deactivate  # on Linux / Mac OS X
$ deactivate         # on Windows
```
